Category.Name: Introducing Buitoni® Riserva
Category.Description: You could be minutes away from an Italian masterpiece. NEW Buitoni Riserva ravioli and agnolotti are artfully crafted with fresh, simple ingredients. The result is an exceptional dish that you'll want to devour right away. Just pair with a simple salad and your favorite wine for an easy, yet elegant, gourmet Italian meal for two.

Product.Name: Wild Mushroom Agnolotti
Product.Description: A blend of earthy mushrooms, including sweet, rustic portobellos and delicate criminis, creates an impeccable pairing with fresh-roasted garlic and imported grana padano and parmesan cheeses, wrapped inside thin layers of stone-ground semolina pasta.

Product.Name: Quattro Formaggi Agnolotti
Product.Description: This agnolotti pairs the savory depth of fresh-roasted garlic with an artful combination of creamy, imported grana padano, parmesan, custom ricotta and fontina cheeses.

Product.Name: Chicken & Four Cheese Ravioli
Product.Description: This artfully-prepared ravioli is filled with moist, all-white-meat chicken, custom ricotta, fontina and grana padano cheeses, and just a hint of aromatic rosemary.

Product.Name: Spicy Beef & Sausage Ravioli
Product.Description: In these generously filled ravioli, savory beef, robust sausage, and coarsely chopped carrots serve as bold counterpoints to a blend of imported grana padano and parmesan cheeses.
